tuv.seg: The Government Chief Whip is the Minister of State for the Department of the Taoiseach
Is é an tAire Stáit i Roinn an Taoisigh a bhíonn mar Phríomhaoire an Rialtais
He or she is responsible for the organisation and co-ordination of Government business in Dáil Éireann
Tá sé/sí freagrach as eagrú agus comhordú a dhéanamh ar ghnóthaí an Rialtais i nDáil Éireann
The Chief Whip acts as a channel of communication between the Government and the opposition parties
Bíonn an Príomhaoire ina (h)idirghabhálaí cumarsáide idir an Rialtas agus lucht an fhreasúra
The Chief Whip is also responsible for making sure that the Government has a voting majority in the Dáil by ensuring that TDs attend Dáil sessions when a vote is being taken

Tá sé de chúram ar an bPríomhaoire déanamh cinnte go bhfuil tromlach vótála ag an Rialtas sa Dáil agus déanann sí/sí cinnte go bhfuil na Teachtaí Dála go léir i láthair sa Dáil nuair atá vóta á chaitheamh
To instruct a TD to attend to vote, he or she can issue a whip
Nuair a chuirtear iallach ar Theachta Dála freastal ar an Dáil ag am vótála, deirtear go n-úsáidtear Lasc
The Chief Whip has a function in monitoring the progress made by Government departments in preparing legislation
Tá ról ag an bPríomhaoire monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar an dul chun cinn atá déanta ag na Ranna Rialtais in ullmhú reachtaíochta
He or she also arranges for the proposed legislation to be considered and debated in the Dáil
Déanann sé/sí na socruithe le go mbeidh an reachtaíocht mholta curtha ós comhair na Dála le díospóireacht
